attributes.title: I was shocked ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸
attributes.review: On the app there were many misspelled words and I think even some made up ones. The app was slow and the color scheme was really bad. For some reason they kept advertising this weird orange spray tan and it would pop up every 30 seconds! Honestly I think I lost some brain cells on this app...like honestly. Please delete this app and rate it 1 star bc yikes itâ€™s soooooo bad. SOME HOW It CRACKED MY PHONE AND REMOVED ALL OF MY SOCIAL MEDIA APPS!!!!!!!!!!!????

attributes.title: THIS APP IS A CURSE !!
attributes.review: So I'm a super big MAGA supporter, right?? Like I would do anything for trump to ***** *** **** ***** ** *****, but all of a sudden, right when I entered my phone #, MY PHONE SWALLOWED ME!!! It took me into a MAGA universe and had "all lives matter" written all over the skies. Then trump force organizations took my by the neck and paralyzed me from the waist down. I am now living in a wheelchair with three kids and currently homeless because it took all my money.

attributes.title: Iâ€™m so sorry
attributes.review: This app is such a great place itâ€™s just that you have to be over 17 to use it which makes me angry because donâ€™t ALL lives matter but I would like to let you all know that our Cheeto president is doing the best he can and I hope that the next time we see trump 2020 itâ€™s in a grave stone because the man has had sooo much hate and he deserves a little break from all of it.

attributes.title: VIRUS ALERT
attributes.review: My innocence was stolen from me the day I got this app. I tried to sign up but then my phone shut of and after an hour it turned on again. I was baffled to see pornography all over my phone. I presume the app hacked my phone and gave it a virus . I have to get a knew phone because my phone keeps beeping and sending random threats .  I feel so scared knowing that this app knows where I live !

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: I am ashamed to have downloaded this app. I just wanted to support my favorite bunker boy president, but when I opened the app it was his only-fans! I am viscerally disgusted. I have seen many things that I wish I could unsee, and my wonderful president has now lost my approval. I am now going to bleach my eyeballs. Blindness is better than whatever you will see when you download this app.ğŸ§šâœ¨
